comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: This is a view of Gettysburg from Cemetery Hill.

comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: The Culp farm buildings are visible in the right background. Wesley Culp, who was related to the family, served in the Confederate Army and, according to legend, visited his sister during the course of the battle. He was killed on July 2, 1863.
